short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ragdoll Archers: A fun and challenging archery game! Aim, shoot, and hit targets in this addictive ragdoll adventure.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ragdoll Archers is a fun and physics-based shooting game where you control a ragdoll archer in a battle against other ragdoll opponents. Aim carefully and use your bow to take down enemies before they hit you. Adjust your angle and power for the perfect shot while dealing with the unpredictable, floppy movements of your ragdoll character. Test your precision, strategy, and timing in this quirky, action-packed archery game!

If you have any questions about our Ragdoll Archers Unblocked game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.

If you wish to remove this extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the Ragdoll Archers Unblocked game extension.
4. Press "Remove"
